## Conference Locations

ISRE2024 will take place **on the main Queen's University Belfast campus**, in the [Whitla Hall](https://www.qub.ac.uk/events-at-queens/venues/whitla-hall/), the [Great Hall](https://www.qub.ac.uk/events-at-queens/venues/great_hall/), and the Peter Froggatt Centre.

![](isre_buildings.png)

::: {style='text-align:center;'}
Download the campus map [here](https://www.qub.ac.uk/home/Filestore/Filetoupload,1511241,en.pdf).
